FuncDef: The display mib-index interface command displays interface indexes in a management information base (MIB). The display mib-index interface command displays interface indexes in a management information base (MIB).

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the index value of a specified type of interface in the MIB.
The value is of the enumerated type.

Displays the index value of an interface with a specified number in the MIB.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To view the values of interface indexes in a MIB, run the display mib-index interface command. This configuration helps the NMS view the interface indexes mapped to interface names.
